--- title: About heading: About EpiComp ---

EpiComp is the 6mm sci-fi miniature painting competition started in 2003 on the TacComm forums. Basically, it's an excuse to show off what you've spent all year painting in the world of Epic models. Painters compete across a handful of categories in the hopes of claiming the glory of being the crowd favorite. Entry is free and explained on the Rules page, so get painting and check back here towards the end of the year for plenty of Epic goodness.
